issue.title: [R][CI] R UCRT C++ bundles are incomplete
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13915](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13915). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`[~jeroenooms]` noticed this when some checks were triggered at CRAN. To prevent things like this, we need ARROW-13683, but we can still fix this now.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13915?focusedCommentId=17410624) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11096
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11096>
